statusLine.command_: powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "$j = $input | ConvertFrom-Json; $g = git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>$null; $c = if ($r = $j.context_window.remaining_percentage) { '{0:N1}%' -f $r } else { 'N/A' }; $t = if ($j.context_window.remaining_tokens) { '({0}k)' -f [math]::Round($j.context_window.remaining_tokens/1000,1) } else { '' }; Write-Host "[$($j.model.display_name)] $(Split-Path -Leaf $j.workspace.current_dir) $(if ($g) {"($g)"}) - $($j.output_style.name) - $c $t" -ForegroundColor Cyan"
